body:
Hey, I think I've already made an introduction post like this one before, but that was such a long time ago and I'm very lazy to figure out if I even did post on of these, haha. But I've been playing on the server for a while. Well, I joined about four months ago (According to the information given on my profile). I'm just starting to get back into the server, and I'm so happy to see that there still is the same loving community and sort of friendly people, lol (People calling each other hackers, curse names, etc.).

But anyways, I am somewhat good at PvP and very skillful with a bow. I usually play Nebula, as most players do, and like to rush, instead of defend, for the action.

I hope to see a lot of you on the server. Don't be afraid to say Hi to me, I won't be afraid to say Hi back ;)

(Not like any of you will even remember this post lol)

title: Hello.

replies.body: Email support@avicus.net with an appeal for an unban or wait out your 6 days. The forums aren't the place.  Next time I would recommend not letting your siblings use your account.

tell them why you were banned and why you think you should be unbanned. It is up to the staff to judge your appeal, so just know the might unban you, they might not.
